changeLanguage: The language is now set to **english**
unknowCommand: Unknown command: I sent you commands tips in private message
commands: **Here the list of commands you can use with this bot**
.Check call ***@class*** -> start the call, *replace by the corresponding class*
.Check addRole ***@role1 @role2***, -> add privileges to one or more roles
.Check rmRole ***@role1 @role2***, -> remove privileges from one or more roles
.Check language en|fr|de -> Change bot language in the following languages : English, French or German
